message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. This is my best offer, let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget, but $18,000 is my absolute best price and I'm confident it's a fair reflection of the value this product brings. I can't go any lower. This is my final offer, take it or leave it.
